text: The 1984 Vuelta a España was the 39th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Jerez de la Frontera, with a prologue individual time trial on 17 April, and Stage 10 occurred on 27 April with a stage to Burgos. The race finished in Madrid on 6 May. ==Prologue== 17 April 1984 — Jerez de la Frontera, (ITT) {| |Prologue result and general classification after Prologue {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
